content.title: Server Rates
content.text:
- XP: x5
- Harvest: x5
- Taming: x5
- Maturation: x25
- Hatch: x50
- Mating Interval: 0.125
- Imprint Interval: 0.0625
- Imprint Multiplier: x2.5

**Player Stats**
- HP: +15 | Melee: +10 | Weight: +75 | Fortitude: +5
- 50% reduced stamina drain

**Dino Stats**
- Weight per point: x7.5

content.title: Solo / Duo Tribe Rates
content.text:
- Solo: DinoCountMultiplier: x0.85
- Solo: Resource Respawn Rate: x1.2
- Duo: DinoDamageMult: x0.95
- Duo: StructureResistance: x1.1

(Weitere Werte folgen...)

content.title: Base / Building Rules
content.text:
- No building in mesh or exploit spots
- No unreachable locations (e.g. chair/grappling hook only)
- Spam allowed, but not excessive
- No flying structures or floating turrets
- Max 1 main base per map + small outposts
- One cave per tribe across the entire cluster
- No building on obelisks (except boss turrets)
- Blocked: Swamp Cave (Island)

content.title: PvP / Raid Rules
content.text:
- No mesh raiding
- Max. 1 hour caging
- No tunnel builds/raids
- Platform dinos must have one fully open side
- No popcorning, despawning, or loot transfers during raids
- Counterraids allowed – must be completed

content.title: Tribe & Character Rules
content.text:
- Use same tribe name cluster-wide
- No insiding allowed
- No offensive names – players will be renamed
- No '123', 'Human', etc.
- Tribes are responsible for all members

content.title: Admin Rules
content.text:
- Do not attack or block admin structures
- Admins are human – mistakes happen
- Report admin abuse with screenshots or video evidence
